Summary: In Israel Ramat gan. Saw orange light in the sky. It didnt move after 5 minutes it fell
trends: There have been no other sightings in Ramat Gan
This sighting has never been favorited.
divs: Sighting DetailsI was walking in the park in south of Ramat-Gan. By a sudden impulse i lifted my head into the sky and saw an orange circulare light. it didnt move for about 3 minutes. then it begun to fall very very rapidly. looked like it crashed on the nighborhood near the park, but there was no sound nor people in panoc. i went near th the falling place. and nothing was heard of in the local papers or news. Looked like it had just dissapered!
